messages.title: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM MARIA EAGLE
messages.content: This is the most important election in a generation. The Tories are planning extremes if re-elected. Only Labour will abolish the bedroom tax, increase the minimum wage & ban exploitative zero hours contracts. Nobody here votes Libdem anymore UKIP will kill off the NHS. The Greens can't be taken seriously. The only way to stop the Tories winning on May 7th is to VOTE LABOUR!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will abolish the bedroom tax.
Labour plans to increase the minimum wage.
Labour intends to ban exploitative zero hours contracts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The only way to stop the Tories winning on May 7th is to VOTE LABOUR!

issues.governance: Labour will abolish the bedroom tax, increase the minimum wage & ban exploitative zero hours contracts.
issues.health: UKIP will kill off the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will abolish the bedroom tax.
